name: RPM Visual Media
tag_list: video-production, online-video, video-management, video-distribution, video-hosting, epk
overview:
RPM Visual Media specializes in internet video production, distribution, management, and hosting.

RPM’s video production services are geared towards brands that want high quality video content or commercials that are produced on-time and on-budget. RPM uses a streamlined production management process to ensure that all elements of a video are produced in a timely manner with complete client buy-in.

VideoEPKs - RPM specializes in creating video electronic press kits (EPKs) for sales professionals, artists, musicians, and other professionals that want an easy and affordable way to promote their image online with video.

RPM’s video distribution services allow clients to upload their videos across a wide range of online video hosting sites to maximize visibility. Clients can also choose to host their video on RPM’s servers with white label video hosting.

RPM also partners strategically with lead generation sites to leverage high quality video to increase traffic and leads generated by our partners.
